block.p: $450,000 401 East 74th Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,350-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, renovated kitchen, marble baths, balcony, 2 exposures; maintenance $1,358, 55% tax-deductible; listed at $469,000, 17 weeks on market (broker: Bellmarc Realty)

$860,000 444 East 86th Street 3-bedroom, 3-bath, 2,240-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining room, renovated kitchen, south exposure; maintenance $1,821, 63% tax-deductible; listed at $875,000, 10 weeks on market (brokers: Halstead Property Co.; Corcoran Group)

$2.85 million 2166 Broadway (75th St.) (The Opera) 5-bedroom, 4-bath, 3,500-sq.-ft. penthouse co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining room, eat-in kitchen, solarium, 2 fireplaces, wrapped terrace, 4 exposures; maintenance $2,600, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $2.85 million, 34 weeks on market (broker: Eychner Associates)

$1.3 million 160 West 66th Street (3 Lincoln Center) 3-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 1,900-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining area, windowed kitchen, parquet floors, marble baths, Hudson River view; common charge $1,161, taxes $4,440; listed at $1.3 million, 2 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

$590,000 1965 Broadway (66th St.) (Grand Millennium) 1-bedroom, 2-bath, 915-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining area, granite kitchen, cherry floors, north exposure; common charge $386, taxes $20,736; listed at $610,000, 4 weeks on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

$460,000 140 77th Street 4-bedroom, 2-bath, prewar frame house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, 1-car garage, 21-by-109-ft. lot; taxes $1,900; listed at $499,000, 4 weeks on market (broker: Velsor Realty)

$999,950 298 Washington Avenue 4-family, 4-story brownstone; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, den in two units; 1 bedroom, 1 bath, dining room, eat-in kitchen in others; 20-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,160; listed at $999,950, 10 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group Brooklyn)

$900,000 909 Union Street 4-family, turn-of-the-century brick house; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath in two units; 1 bedroom, 1 bath, in others; 20-by-90-ft. lot; taxes $4,075; listed at $925,000, 3 weeks on market (broker: Bettancourt & Associates)

$590,000 160-31 Ninth Avenue 7-bedroom, 3-bath, 74-year-old center-hall colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, 2 fireplaces, finished basement, French doors, rear deck, 2-car garage, 80-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,200; listed at $590,000, 2 weeks on market (broker: PCA Realty)

$567,000 77 Michael Loop 4-bedroom, 4-bath, 2-year-old colonial; dining room, family room, breakfast room, finished basement, 2-car garage, 36-by-100-ft. lot; 100% tax-abated; listed at $629,900, 2 years on market (broker: Kingsley Real Estate)

$1.745 million 10 Lockwood Avenue 5-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 72-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, whirlpool bath, central air-conditioning, terrace, 2 fireplaces; 3.6-acre lot; taxes 7,801; listed at $1.795 million, 4 weeks on market (broker: Coldwell Banker/ Greenwich)

$677,500 7 Garden Road 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 62-year-old contemporary; dining room, family room, skylight, whirlpool bath and steam shower, 1-acre lot; taxes $7,985; listed at $715,000, 15 weeks on market (broker: Prudential Connecticut Realty)
